dc:title: On Pilgrimage - June 1956
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reflects on a variety of items--the gift of a statue of Mary, expensive house repairs, appeal to help Puerto Rican children, the crafts of bookbinding and spinning, encouraging children to explore nature, and the plight of the mentally ill.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 708 1956-06-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
